Room.Name: Hidden Sea Alcove
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a secluded corner of the great sea cave.
Room.LongDescription: The area is almost completely hidden form the main cave and has a cool breeze moving across the surface of the water. There must be a hidden chimney near here, with access to the tops of the cliffs. There is a faint sound of water dripping from the ceiling onto the water's calm surface. Although the water is clear, it is so deep that you cannot see the bottom.
